flawed_nl_solution:
He runs at 0.1 miles per minute because 6 / 60 = <<6/60=0.1>>0.1
While the album is playing he can run 4.0 miles because 40 x 0.1 = <<40*0.1=4.0>>4.0
He has to run 2.0 miles without the album because 6 - 4.0 = <<6-4.0=2.0>>2.0
Without music he runs 4/60 miles per minute because 4 / 60 = 4/60
He will run the remaining 2.0 miles in 30.0 minutes because 2.0 / (4/60) = <<2.0/(4/60)=30.0>>30.0
It will take him 71.0 minutes in total because 40 + 30.0 =<<40+30.0=71.0>>71.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 70.0, not 71.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
